subject: Mental Health
title: Dual Diagnosis
description: Learn Dual Diagnosis in one minute.

hook.text: About half of people with addiction also have another mental health disorder.

buildup.text: Depression, anxiety, PTSD, and bipolar disorder frequently co-occur with addiction.

discovery.text: Many people use substances to self-medicate mental health symptoms they can't access care for.

twist.text: Treating only the addiction while ignoring the co-occurring disorder almost guarantees relapse.

climax.text: Integrated treatment addressing both conditions simultaneously has the best outcomes.

punchline.text: One disease hides behind another. Treat both or lose both.

quiz.question: What is dual diagnosis?
options: Addiction co-occurring with another mental health disorder
Two types of the same addiction
